##Install Genomation
```{r}
#BiocManager::install('genomationData')
#BiocManager::install('genomation')

library(genomation)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

##Read in m6A peaks file

```{r}
m6A_peaks <- readGeneric(here("Peak files", "m6A_hg19_new_041619.bed"), header = FALSE)
head(m6A_peaks)
```

##Test scoring over exons

```{r}
gff.file = system.file("extdata/chr21.refseq.hg19.gtf", package = "genomation")

exons = gffToGRanges(gff.file, filter = "CDS")
IRanges::start(exons[334]) <- 26958066
IRanges::end(exons[334]) <- 26958166
exons[which(IRanges::width(exons) ==1)]
sm = ScoreMatrixBin(target = m6A_peaks, windows = exons, bin.num = 50)
sm
```

##Visualization test
```{r}
heatMatrix(sm, xcoords = c(-1000, 1000))
plotMeta(sm, xcoords = c(-1000, 1000))
```
